reviews.text: A perfect wee heavy. Strong dried and chocolatey flavour. Finish is long and dry. Balanced but malty
33cl from De Caigny. Pale blond, fluffy white head. Tropical fruits, spicy hops, dank notes, grapefruit
11/01/2016 33cl. Almost black. Coffee, licorice, roasted malts, caramel, honey, red fruits. Great imperial russian stout
